entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Xamarin.AndroidX.Work.Runtime support for .net7 #11887
  • [xamlc] Try to remove `[LoadInSeparateAppDomain]` #11885
    .NET 8 Planning
  • iOS publish Release not working after update to VS 17.4 #11882
  • .Net 7 Android Unfocused Entry Behavior only gets called when leaving the page #11881
  • [WinUI] If a container is present on a control the DesiredSize returned from the Handler isn't correct if the user has specified explicit Dimensions #11880
  • HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" is ignored in Android when a stack layout is inside a RefreshView #11879
  • Error rendering entry within a grid #11878
  • Removing the entire ContentPage.Resources element does not trigger the UI updates #11877
    Backlog
  • ImageButton with CornerRadius is not calculated as expected on Android when Padding exists #11874
  • [Net7] ScrollView/Grid/Label width calculation broken on .Net 7, no issue on .Net 6 #11873
  • Enable to access dll because it is being used by another process. #11872
  • [IPreferences] Make support types public #11871
  • MAUI program cannot be started in net7.0-android33.0 #11869
  • CollectionView cause Intent memory Leak #11866
  • DisplayPromptAsync : Keyboard.Numeric broken in release mode #11865
    Backlog
  • CSS style does not correctly apply to `Label` using `FormattedText` #11864
    Backlog
  • Label does not get wrapped when in Grid with ColumnSpan #11863
    Backlog
  • ContextActions back-button is always black #11861
    Backlog
  • Resources defined in the App.xaml was not referred for Background Property while deploying in the release mode. #11857
  • Embedding MAUI controls into net6.0-ios project issues #11856
    Backlog
  • [Android] Navigation - PushModal - Page Margin (offset) #11855
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Bug] Windows button rollover doesn't update on rollout #4935
    Backlog
  • Button Background on WinUI only updates after you move the cursor off the Button #4386
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .NET 7.0 Button Background Color doesn't update when IsEnabled is changed on Android 7.1.2 #10426
    Backlog
  • Grouped collectionview problem with performance #10700
    Backlog
  • [IOS]Collection view "ItemsViewSource is Empty" error only on iOS #11666
  • IsSpellCheckEnabled not working. After setting to false, still seeing text with red lines in entry tag. #11862
  • [iOS] Type x:Double not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #6070
    Backlog
  • [Android]First added entry get focus when unfocusing the second added entry dynamically in navigation page #10486
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Essentials FilePicker API Docs #11870
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Email API Docs #11868
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [net7.0] [build] Add support for Visual Studio on win-arm64 #11876
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net6.0] [build] Add support for Visual Studio on win-arm64 #11875
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Build] Remove unused variable #11727
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [main] Update PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files #11760
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net6.0] Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Clean up the files in the xml-docs artifacts #11792
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11775
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove Android LaunchAdjacent flag for Essentials #11783
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Possible fix for issue #10960 #11798
  • Add empty PointerOver states to Buttons to reduce confusion #11842
  • Reconcile PointerOver, Pressed, and Focused states #11840
  • [net8.0] Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11845
  • [net7.0] Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11843
  • [net6.0] Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11844
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.0.0 to 4.0.1 #11826
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Build] Add maestro-changelog workflow action #11757
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Bump Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11799
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Android] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖
  • [WinUI] Fix the size returned when measuring Frame #11779
    area/layout 🔲
  • Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #11591
    area/gestures
  • [Android] Setup `Frame` with all of the missing `Mapper` methods #11804
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #11597
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Update PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files #11759
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [net8.0] Run dotnet format #11761
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Clear before each Image Source change #11787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
